title: IBM News Gothic
content:
Hi   
   
Is anyone aware of where I could find the font IBM news gothic?   
   
Apparently its a version of News Gothic used by IBM in the 60's and Im desperate to get hold of it.   
   
Any help would be great as I have already stumped all of my peers with this one.   
   
Best
author: rich

comments.content:
Richard -   
   
My guess is that you'd have to get the actual   
News Gothic "golf ball" for the Selectric - for   
which the face was designed. There are   
examples of this face in the Karel Martens   
"Printed Matter" book. If my memory   
serves, the examples are naturally very   
small. Although, you would think there are   
some specimens somewhere.
